text: The Inn of the Siren is a tavern in the underwater district of [[Dwellwater]], [[Sharn]]. The establishment caters to both land and sea dwellers; half of its rooms are located below the surface of the [[Dagger River]], while the others rise above it. An eclectic assemblage of [[sea elves|sea elf]], [[merfolk]], [[locathah]], [[sahuagin]], and all types of air-breathing folk of Sharn can be found here.
title: Inn of the Siren
